861951363362084.Text: Attribute-draining spells reduce the eleven fundamental attributes of natural and supernatural beings: agility, endurance, fatigue, health, intelligence, luck, personality, speed, strength, willpower, magica. The reduction is only temporary, and the attribute returns to normal after the duration of the magical effect elapses. The most common of these destruction spells are: clumsiness, distraction, exhaustion, gash spirit , misfortune, spite, strain, temptation, torpor, weakness, and wound.
